entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a person who is being attacked by Harry and Ron. He is described as having a wand arm and a silver hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is attacking Wormtail along with Ron. He is described as slapping his hand to Wormtail's mouth to muffle his voice.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is attacking Wormtail along with Harry. He is described as seizing Wormtail's wand arm and forcing it upwards.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a person who is calling out to Wormtail from above. He is described as asking what is wrong with Wormtail.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are attacking Wormtail. This is described in the text as 'Silently they struggled: Wormtail’s wand emitted sparks; his silver hand closed around Harry’s throat.'
Ron is attacking Wormtail along with Harry. This is described in the text as 'Silently they struggled: Wormtail’s wand emitted sparks; his silver hand closed around Harry’s throat.'
Lucius Malfoy is questioning Wormtail from above. This is described in the text as '“What is it, Wormtail?” called Lucius Malfoy from above.'

Ron is deceiving Wormtail by calling back in a passable imitation of Wormtail's wheezy voice. This is described in the text as '“Nothing!” Ron called back, in a passable imitation of Wormtail’s wheezy voice.'
